nodes.text: The Library of Xer was a library on the planet Criton's Point.
The library was built in 26,000 BBY, by Xer VIII or one of his predecessors.

The library was slowly being reopened by a research team during the period of the Galactic Civil War. Inside one vault, they found a tiny tree that was being nourished by the Force. Its Force-presence attracted Force users—both dark and light.
